name: Dangerous Adventure (itch)
description:
• An exciting and dangerous adventure In which You will have to face traps            and   monsters.Help the game character overcome all the difficulties, clear the world of monsters and collect all the coins that they guard.The game offers 9 exciting levels.Different types of enemies, traps and an incredible atmosphere of the game  in  the platformer genre.
  • This is my first job.I will be happy to receive any criticism and advice.If you           support me financially, I will be happy.Thanks for your attention.
